Writing About Now

Now

What I'm focused on right now

Updated January 2025

Building

Deep in autonomous agent architectures. The gap between “works in demo” and “works in production” is where I live right now. Solving reliability, recovery, and real-world messiness.

Learning

Reasoning models changed everything. Studying how test-time compute, chain-of-thought, and verification loops create genuine problem-solving capability—not just pattern matching.

Reading

  • Research papers on agent architectures
  • Dieter Rams on design principles
  • Anything on systems thinking

Not Doing

  • Social media doom-scrolling
  • Meetings that should be emails
  • Premature optimization

This is a now page—a snapshot of current focus, not a permanent bio.
